title: ANSI Viewer
name: ansi-viewer
description: View ANSI file in the browser
author: eight04 <eight04@gmail.com>

scripts.build: shx rm -rf extension/js && rollup -c && npm run build-asset
scripts.postversion: npm run build && npm run build-zip && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build-asset: shx mkdir -p extension/css && shx cp node_modules/bbs-reader/bbs-reader.css extension/css && shx cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js extension/js
